duties_responsibilities.duty: Deployment, automation, management, and maintenance of diverse set of build systems for multiple software.
Management of creation, release, and configuration of production systems.
Creating and Maintaining Network Modules, VPN services.
Ensuring availability, performance, security, and scalability of Test & Production systems.
Management of continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines.
Track and resolve build failures, working with developers as necessary.
Maintain documentation for build and release processes.
Providing recommendations for architecture and process improvements.
Collaborate with the development teams to understand build requirements and develop solutions.
Assist in managing project and issue tracking with Jira.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering or equivalent experience
